mdRecord.dcterms:title: Edison Brothers Building Mural, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Haas, Richard (American trompe l'oeil painter and muralist, born 1936) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a three-sided mural with eight obelisks at its corners, a painted sculpture of Peace on the west facade, and a painted equestrian statue of St. Louis on the south facade. -- http://www.richardhaas.com/ [work]
